name: Klextric Pros Online
description:
This is a scalextric clone for pc. Tell your ip to your friends and create a game with your friends. Need to open a 20502 port in tcp udp.

Try to get the best time and see the highscore pressing TAB. If you have a over speed, you crash the car.

CONTROLS:

Mouse Left Button to run, SPACE for change rail, Tab to see highscores.
